column5: Haven't posted a report in a long time and I still enjoy all eveybody elses posts, so heres some pics form last weekend on lake St.Clair, fished out of a crowded area, but all are fish came out in the lake, fish were caught on 10" perch coloured baits jakes and nils, hope to get out again early next week, heres the pics           Just to add a pic in, this is a pick I took off an early morning off bronte, can't wait till spring!
Awesome Fish and beautiful pic of sunrise.
nice stuff moe moe. have not heard from you in a while
That's one helluva great day  Fantastic pics....How long was the one in the last pic?  Great report ,thanx for sharing  Streamerguy
Nicely done!!! With pics like that, you should be posting more often
Wow, what a day! Congrats. Jim
Nice muskies! I love how the lake st clair musky look. alot different from the kawartha fish for sure.
Awesome Moemoe.  Never caught a musky myself...wish i could though...lol.  That downrigger shot is fantastic.   Thanks for sharing.

Unsure of exactly how long the last fish was, I brought an old tape measure with, but it got stuck at 40"! and i discovered using a metal tape measure in the water is not that easy....i should have taken a pic of the other side of that fish, as it had one eye and busted jaw....real ugly sucker.....probably why it was so skinny

One more thing that I want to add, is about some of the pin heads fishing from shore at the thames. one guy I saw caught a low 40's fish and another gent netted the fish for the guy, but the guy doing the netting purposely whips the fish out of the net onto to the gravel, doesn't want to touch the fish while he gets the hooks out and then kicks the fish back over the sidewall and 5 foot drop! If you don't want to touch the fish, don't fish for them!
Some very nice sized St.Clair muskies guys WTG !!!!  ...nice pics too...cheers
yes moe some folks have no respect. i have even heard stories of folks being threatened and  belittled for calling the mnr on flagrant violations.. the river mentioned is only 1 rod per angler.
Good job Moe. I hope to see you on the water soon. I have stayed away from the (zoo) but will make a trip or 2 during the wk days once in a while. Tell the gang I said "Hi".
Thanks Bob and George, you two guys definetly opened my eyes to fishing the southwest corner...hope to bump into both you agains soon
Great report and pics moemoe  Real nice looking skis    Well done Thanks for sharing Leechman
I can't wait to get down there again MOEMOE. NIce fish man!!
Not a bad haul at all for the week-end.   I forget what it's like to catch one.   Congrats.
